title.en: Prayer to the Great Paṇḍita Vimalamitra

text.en: Paṇḍita who adorned the crowns of scholars from the noble land,
Vimalamitra, master of the teachings of the supreme vehicle,
text.en-trans: drimé shenyen tek chok tenpé dak

text.en: Who attained the supreme vajra form of the rainbow body—
text.en-trans: jalü dorjé ku chok nyepa la

text.en: To you I pray: inspire me with your blessings!
text.en-trans: solwa deb so jingyi lab tu sol
